title: [SPARK-42817][CORE] Logging the shuffle service name once in ApplicationMaster
body:
### What changes were proposed in this pull request?
Removed the logging of shuffle service name multiple times in the driver log. It gets logged everytime a new executor is allocated.

### Why are the changes needed?
This is needed because currently the driver logs gets polluted by these logs:
```
22/08/03 20:42:07 INFO ExecutorRunnable: Initializing service data for shuffle service using name 'spark_shuffle_311'
22/08/03 20:42:07 INFO ExecutorRunnable: Initializing service data for shuffle service using name 'spark_shuffle_311'
22/08/03 20:42:07 INFO ExecutorRunnable: Initializing service data for shuffle service using name 'spark_shuffle_311'
22/08/03 20:42:07 INFO ExecutorRunnable: Initializing service data for shuffle service using name 'spark_shuffle_311'
22/08/03 20:42:07 INFO ExecutorRunnable: Initializing service data for shuffle service using name 'spark_shuffle_311'
22/08/03 20:42:07 INFO ExecutorRunnable: Initializing service data for shuffle service using name 'spark_shuffle_311'
22/08/03 20:42:07 INFO ExecutorRunnable: Initializing service data for shuffle service using name 'spark_shuffle_311'
22/08/03 20:42:07 INFO ExecutorRunnable: Initializing service data for shuffle service using name 'spark_shuffle_311'
22/08/03 20:42:07 INFO ExecutorRunnable: Initializing service data for shuffle service using name 'spark_shuffle_311'
22/08/03 20:42:07 INFO ExecutorRunnable: Initializing service data for shuffle service using name 'spark_shuffle_311'
22/08/03 20:42:07 INFO ExecutorRunnable: Initializing service data for shuffle service using name 'spark_shuffle_311'
22/08/03 20:42:07 INFO ExecutorRunnable: Initializing service data for shuffle service using name 'spark_shuffle_311'
22/08/03 20:42:07 INFO ExecutorRunnable: Initializing service data for shuffle service using name 'spark_shuffle_311'
```

### Does this PR introduce _any_ user-facing change?
Yes, the shuffle service name will be just logged once in the driver.


### How was this patch tested?
Tested manually since it just changes the logging.
With this see this logged in the driver logs:
`23/03/15 16:50:54 INFO  ApplicationMaster: Initializing service data for shuffle service using name 'spark_shuffle_311'`
